about_the_game:
Flash Gordon Combat Map 1: Arboria + Fast Pursuit Rocket

Featuring a sunken rocket ship, coral outcroppings, and temptingly sensuous sea life, this beautiful map from Alida Saxon offers an underwater landscape for exploration--or ambush!
A double-sided, 24" x 30" poster map of Coralia (a beautiful underwater reef encounter) on one side and a War Rocket on the other, this map is designed for use with our Flash Gordon(TM) miniatures! Maps are wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.
Fast, nimble, well-armored, and well-armed, the War Rocket is ideal for air combat, bombing runs, and troop and gear transport.
This full color map has a layer with a 1" grid.
This product requires the Flash Gordon(TM) RPG and Savage Worlds  core rules to play. This product was written for Savage Worlds Deluxe, but is easily adaptable for the Adventure Edition.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.

Flash Gordon Combat Map 1: Arboria + Fast Pursuit Rocket

Featuring a sunken rocket ship, coral outcroppings, and temptingly sensuous sea life, this beautiful map from Alida Saxon offers an underwater landscape for exploration--or ambush!
A double-sided, 24" x 30" poster map of Coralia (a beautiful underwater reef encounter) on one side and a War Rocket on the other, this map is designed for use with our Flash Gordon(TM) miniatures! Maps are wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.
Fast, nimble, well-armored, and well-armed, the War Rocket is ideal for air combat, bombing runs, and troop and gear transport.
This full color map has a layer with a 1" grid.
This product requires the Flash Gordon(TM) RPG and Savage Worlds  core rules to play. This product was written for Savage Worlds Deluxe, but is easily adaptable for the Adventure Edition.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
